contact.heading: Contact me
contact.ready_to_collaborate: Ready to collaborate on an exciting project? I'm always open to new opportunities and exchanging ideas.
contact.response_time: I usually reply within 24 to 48 hours.
contact.title: Send a message

form.success_message: Thank you! Your message has been sent

projects_work.try_filter: Try selecting a different filter to see more projects.

pfl.title: PFL - Training Tracking
pfl.description: Training tracking application developed with Power Apps and Dataverse. Enables monitoring of training completed within a department with Power BI dashboards for analysis and performance indicators tracking.

bcl.title: BCL - Inventory Management
bcl.description: Complete inventory management tool developed with Power Apps and Dataverse. Automation of inventory and restocking processes through Power Automate to optimize resource management.

gesp.title: GESP - Asset Management
gesp.description: IT asset management solution based on Power Apps and Dataverse. Equipment tracking, preventive maintenance, and workflow automation with Power Automate for efficient hardware fleet management.

home.intro_paragraph: I am currently pursuing a degree in IT engineering, with a strong focus on web development and software design.
home.about_paragraph: As an engineering student, I am focusing on the Power Platform to design business applications, automate processes and exploit data. I enjoy transforming concrete needs into simple, reliable and maintainable solutions that serve users.
home.objectives_desc: Join a team as a Power Platform developer to design low-code solutions tailored to business challenges and move on to high-impact projects.
home.philosophy_desc: Understanding the need, modelling the data, automating processes and delivering a clear, documented and scalable solution.
home.team_spirit_desc: Power Apps (Canvas & Model-driven), Power Automate, Dataverse, integration with Microsoft 365, and low-code governance concepts.
home.hobbies_desc: Outside of technology, I enjoy padel and trail running, which help me maintain focus and discipline.

quote.author: Leonardo da Vinci
quote.text: What we do matters as much as how we do it.

engineering.title: Work-study Engineering Programme
engineering.description: After completing an integrated preparatory class, I joined the 3-year engineering program at CESI, in a work-study format with TotalEnergies as a Power Platform Developer. During this cycle, I was able to alternate between academic learning and real-world projects, gaining hands-on experience in various areas of computer science such as web development, software engineering, databases, and IT systems.

preparatory.title: Integrated Preparatory Class
preparatory.description: For my higher education, I started with a 2-year integrated preparatory program at CESI. The first year was general, covering not only computer science but also physics and civil engineering. In the second year, I specialized in computer science, with courses and projects focused on web development, networking, application development, and even embedded systems using Arduino.

highschool.title: General Baccalaureate (High School Diploma)
highschool.description: After obtaining my Brevet des Collèges with highest honors (mention très bien), I continued my studies at L’Immaculée Conception, a private high school in Pau, where I spent three years completing my French General Baccalaureate. During this time, I pursued the scientific track with majors in Mathematics, Physics, and Biology (SVT). This rigorous curriculum allowed me to strengthen both my analytical and problem-solving skills, while also developing a strong academic discipline. I graduated with honors (mention bien), which highlights my academic achievements and commitment throughout my high school years.

totalenergies.responsibilities:
As a Power Platform Developer, I am responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining multiple business applications that are actively used on site. My role includes drafting detailed technical documentation and writing clear specifications to ensure alignment with business needs.

I also deliver training sessions for employees to help them adopt and use new tools.

pula_university.responsibilities:
As a Full Stack Developer, I was responsible for creating the official website of the company forta.hr, using React, Tailwind CSS, and PHP. During this project, I worked on both the front-end and back-end, ensuring a responsive design and a contact form for client communication.

This abroad internship (Croatia) lasted five months and was part of my academic curriculum, providing valuable practical experience.

safran.responsibilities:
As a SharePoint Developer, my main objective was to design and implement a departmental portal in SharePoint. The project involved structuring a workspace where all files of the department could be stored, organized, and accessed efficiently.

This internship was part of my academic curriculum, allowing me to strengthen both my technical skills in SharePoint and my ability to understand organizational needs.

fishmonger.responsibilities:
During this summer job in a fish shop, I was involved in both customer service and product preparation, including tasks such as filleting fish. This role required strong attention to detail, speed, and respect for hygiene standards.

It was my first professional experience, where I gained valuable social skills through daily interactions with customers and teamwork with colleagues.

bigband64.title: BigBand64
bigband64.description: Website for the BigBand64 association, a music group based in Pau. The objective was to design a professional website that reflects the identity of the association and supports its growing popularity.

forta.title: Forta Website
forta.description: A professional website created during an internship. Forta is a company producing plastic and metal components for other businesses. The project showcased the company’s expertise with a modern design and clear structure.

grill.title: GRILL
grill.description: A school project simulating a food delivery system similar to Uber Eats, with dedicated web applications for restaurants, customers, and delivery staff. The project aimed to recreate a complete digital ecosystem for modern food services.

cybersecurity_career.title: Prepare Your Cybersecurity Career by Microsoft and LinkedIn
